org.jboss.seam.ui.Token org.jboss.seam.ui.Token org.jboss.seam.ui.component.html.HtmlToken org.jboss.seam.ui.component.UIToken
Render a secure token in the parent form that is validated on postback to guard against CSRF attacks.
org.jboss.seam.ui.TokenRenderer org.jboss.seam.ui.renderkit.TokenRendererBase
token org.jboss.seam.ui.taglib.TokenTag
org.jboss.seam.ui.util.cdk.UIComponentTagBase
&ui_component_attributes;
requireSession boolean A flag indicating whether the session id should be tied into the secure token. false
enableCookieNotice boolean A flag indicating whether a notice should be presented to the user if cookies are disabled. false
allowMultiplePosts boolean A flag indicating whether the form can be submitted multiple times with the same signature (i.e., token). false
